const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      mode: "synthetic",
    },
    properties: {
      text: {
        type: "text",
        fields: {
          raw: {
            type: "keyword",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    text: [
      "the quick brown fox",
      "the quick brown fox",
      "jumped over the lazy dog",
    ],
  },
});
console.log(response1);
